party.name: SANTA CRUZ COUNTY REGIONAL TRANSPORTATION COMMISSION
party.address: Santa Cruz County Regional Transportation Commission, 1523 Pacific Ave, Santa Cruz, CA 95060

offerAndAcceptance.offer: This Agreement serves as a Professional Services Agreement for specific services or projects as referenced in the contract.
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: Both parties acknowledge and consent to the terms and conditions as outlined herein.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: The parties have reached a mutual understanding and agreement of the terms laid out in this document.

consideration.description: Payment for professional services rendered by the CONSULTANT.
consideration.value: Not to exceed $_____ for time and materials as per Exhibit B - Fee Schedule.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: Both parties intend for this Agreement to create legal obligations.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: The purpose of this Agreement complies with all applicable laws and regulations.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: Scope of Services as laid out in Exhibit A.
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: This Agreement shall commence upon approval and notification to proceed.

contract.consent: CONSULTANT shall obtain written consent for any changes to key personnel as specified.
contract.formAndFormalities: This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties and is binding upon execution.

durationAndTermination.duration: This Agreement shall take effect on (DATE) and end on (DATE).
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Termination by either party with a written notice as specified.
durationAndTermination.renewalTerms: Renewal shall be documented by written agreement from both parties.

contract.representationsAndWarranties: Each party represents that they have the authority to enter into this Agreement.
contract.indemnification: CONSULTANT shall indemnify and hold harmless COMMISSION from any claims arising from negligence.

disputeResolution.method: Dispute resolution via a committee of the COMMISSION's Contract Manager and Executive Director.
disputeResolution.details: Unresolved disputes may be reviewed by the COMMISSION GOVERNING BOARD.

governingLawAndJurisdiction.jurisdiction: Jurisdiction in the courts in California.

contract.severability: If any provision is found to be invalid, the remainder will still be enforceable.
contract.forceMajeure: Neither party shall be liable for failure to perform due to unforeseen circumstances.
contract.confidentiality: All proprietary information obtained during this Agreement shall remain confidential.
contract.assignmentAndDelegation: CONSULTANT cannot assign this Agreement without prior written consent from COMMISSION.

signature.declaration: This Agreement is executed by the duly authorized representatives.

signature.partyName: SANTA CRUZ COUNTY REGIONAL TRANSPORTATION COMMISSION
signature.declaration: This Agreement is executed by the duly authorized representatives.
